heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral Amazonian medicine, a sacred brew resulting from the cooking of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of Chacruna (Psychotria viridis). Together, they create a potent concoction that opens the doors of perception, facilitating deep healing on a physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual level.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca acts as a catalyst for introspection. The DMT present in Chacruna, activated by the inhibitors in Ayahuasca, allows access to expanded states of consciousness. In this state, it is possible to confront and heal traumas, release emotional blockages, gain clarity on life's purpose, and reconnect with the essence of being.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is much more than a substance; it is a living intelligence, a master that guides each person on a unique and personalized journey. It works with love and wisdom, showing what needs to be seen and healed, always with the goal of restoring inner balance and harmony.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and purpose. Ayahuasca helps you see beyond self-imposed limitations and find answers to your deepest questions.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release traumas, fears, and negative patterns that hold you back. The medicine allows you to process repressed emotions in a safe and supportive environment, facilitating deep healing.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep connection with yourself, others, and the universe. Ayahuasca reminds you that you are part of something larger, renewing your sense of belonging and faith.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the healing energy in a circle of trust and mutual support. Group ceremonies enhance the experience, creating a field of collective healing.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed to address your specific needs. Ideal for those seeking deep and individualized work.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover the history, benefits, and transformative power of Ayahuasca, the sacred medicine of the Amazon.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the team of expert guides and facilitators who will accompany you on your journey with safety and wisdom.
preparationCtaDescription: Prepare for your ceremony with our complete guide on diet, intention, and mental and spiritual preparation.
contactCommunityText: Join our community and follow our journey on social media. We are here to answer your questions and support you every step of the way.
guidesPageSubtitle: A team of facilitators dedicated to holding a sacred space for healing, support, and transformation. Each guide brings their experience, wisdom, and love, ensuring a safe and profound accompaniment on your journey with the medicine.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming ceremonies and find the perfect space for your healing journey.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are currently no active ceremonies. Please check back soon.
fullPlanUpTo: Full plan for up to 2 people
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is the key to a deep and transformative experience. Follow this guide to align your body, mind, and spirit.
preparationProcessDescription: Understanding the phases of the journey is fundamental. From initial preparation to post-ceremony integration, each step is important to maximize the benefits of the medicine.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The sacred ritual where the medicine is consumed. It is a space of introspection, visions, and release, guided by songs (icaros) and the energy of the circle.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep journey into your inner self. It can include visions, emotional release, revelations, and a sense of unity and universal connection.
integrationProcessDescription: Applying the teachings of the ceremony to your daily life. It is the process of translating visions and revelations into concrete and lasting changes.
dietSubtitle: Three days before the ceremony, purify your body to receive the medicine.
allowedFoodsList:
• Fresh fruits and vegetables
• Whole grains (rice, oats, quinoa)
• Legumes (lentils, chickpeas)
• Water, herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList:
• Red meat and pork
• Spicy, fried, or processed food
• Dairy and fermented products
• Sugar, excess salt, caffeine, alcohol
mentalPrepSubtitle: Open your heart and mind for the journey that awaits.
meditationDescription: Dedicate time to meditate, calm your mind, and reduce external noise. Silence is a great ally.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you seek to heal or understand. A clear intention serves as a beacon during the experience.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes. This will help you clarify your intention and process the experience afterward.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony is an opportunity to release stagnant emotions. Allow yourself to feel without judgment. Vulnerability is your greatest strength in this process. Trust the medicine, the guides, and your own ability to heal. You are in a safe and supportive space to explore the depths of your being.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
comfortItemsList:
• Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers)
• Blanket or sleeping bag and pillow
• Yoga mat
essentialsList:
• Water bottle
• Toilet paper or tissues
• Journal and pen for notes
• Open mind and heart

chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later or contact a human guide.

coursesDescription: Our video courses are designed to guide you through every step of your preparation for the Ayahuasca ceremony. Complete the required courses to ensure you arrive prepared in mind, body, and spirit.

editCourseDescription: Modify the details of this course.
deleteCourseConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete the course.

pleaseCompleteThisStep: Please complete this step to continue.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your questionnaire. Please try again.
aiGuideDescription: Your preparation continues! You now have access to two powerful tools:
aiGuideContent: An AI spiritual guide available 24/7 to answer your questions about the medicine, preparation, and process. You can also explore our video courses to deepen your knowledge.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is the key to a deep and transformative experience. Follow this guide to align your body, mind, and spirit.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed the preparation guide. You are one step closer to your healing journey. We recommend watching the courses to deepen your understanding even more.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: Here you can review the answers you provided.
